uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

udp_port.description: The UDP Port Number used for Accounting.

round_trip_time_in_seconds.description: The Round Trip Time Taken by the RADIUS Server for Accounting.

pending_requests.description: Number of Accounting Request packets pending on the RADIUS Server.

retransmitted_requests.description: Number of Accounting Request packets retransmitted to the RADIUS Server.

timeouts.description: Number of Accounting timeouts to the RADIUS Server.

malformed_responses.description: Number of malformed Accounting Response packets received from the RADIUS Server.

bad_authenticators.description: Number of Accounting Response packets received with invalid authenticators  from the RADIUS Server.

unknown_types.description: Number of packets received with unknown type from the RADIUS Server.

packets_dropped.description: Number of packets dropped from the RADIUS Server.

total_requests.description: Number of Accounting Request packets sent to the RADIUS Server.

total_responses.description: Number of Accounting Response packets received from the RADIUS Server.
